description.value: You gain an appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Unblinking Flame Aura] for Unblinking Flame, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Unbreaking Wave Vapor] for Unbreaking Waves, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Unfolding Wind Buffet] for Unfolding Wind, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Untwisting Iron Roots] for Untwisting Iron. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. You become an expert in occult spell DCs and occult spell attack rolls.
